## ResolvedBundle type

Represents a resolved Bundle: the actual Bundle and the subset of given items which are contained in it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ResolvedBundle = VirtualFolder;
```

**References:** [VirtualFolder](./open-api-client.virtualfolder.md)
